TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit Switch extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供抽象基底類別，建立新的偵錯與追蹤切換。

span.span: Provides an abstract base class to create new debugging and tracing switches.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交換器提供有效率的機制，在執行階段使用外部設定控制追蹤和偵錯輸出。A switch provides an efficient mechanism for controlling tracing and debugging output at run time using external settings. 類別會實作針對參數，可讓您在執行階段變更的交換器層級的預設行為。The class implements default behavior for switches, allowing you to change the switch level at run time. 這個類別是基底類別，而類別。This class is the base class for the , and the classes. 這些參數符合大部分偵錯和追蹤的需求。These switches meet most debugging and tracing needs. 如需有關追蹤參數的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md)。For more information about trace switches, see [Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/trace-switches.md). 您必須啟用追蹤或偵錯要使用參數。You must enable tracing or debugging to use a switch. 下列語法是特定的編譯器。The following syntax is compiler specific. 如果您使用 C# 或 Visual Basic 以外的編譯器時，請參閱編譯器的文件。If you use compilers other than C# or Visual Basic, refer to the documentation for your compiler. - 若要啟用偵錯 C# 中，新增`/d:DEBUG`旗標，當您編譯程式碼，或者您可以新增時，編譯器命令列以`#define DEBUG`至檔案頂端。To enable debugging in C#, add the `/d:DEBUG` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or you can add `#define DEBUG` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:DEBUG=True`至編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:DEBUG=True` flag to the compiler command line. - 若要啟用 追蹤使用 C# 中，新增`/d:TRACE`旗標來編譯程式碼，或新增時，才會進行編譯器命令列`#define TRACE`至檔案頂端。To enable tracing using in C#, add the `/d:TRACE` flag to the compiler command line when you compile your code, or add `#define TRACE` to the top of your file. 在 Visual Basic 中，新增`/d:TRACE=True`至編譯器命令列的旗標。In Visual Basic, add the `/d:TRACE=True` flag to the compiler command line. 若要設定您的交換器層級，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To set the level of your switch, edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以加入某個參數，和將其值設定、 移除參數，或清除所有先前設定中的參數，應用程式。Within this file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ``` 這個範例的組態區段會定義具有屬性設定為`mySwitch`並值設定為`true`。This example configuration section defines a with the property set to `mySwitch` and the value set to `true`. 在您的應用程式中，您可以使用設定的參數值，藉由建立具有相同名稱，如下列程式碼範例所示。Within your application, you can use the configured switch value by creating a with the same name, as shown in the following code example. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/remarks.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/remarks.cs#4)] ## Examples 下列範例示範如何定義新與四種可用來追蹤呼叫堆疊的追蹤層級的類別。The following example shows how to define a new class with four levels of tracing that can be used to trace a call stack. 您可以使用切換到檢測進入或離開您的應用程式，來記錄每次方法。You can use the switch to instrument your application to log each time the method is entered or exited. 第一個範例會建立用來設定參數的層級的列舉型別。The first example creates the enumeration used to set the level of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下列範例會建立新的參數。The following example creates the new switch. 程式碼會實作`Level`屬性來設定新的參數的值。The code implements a `Level` property to set the value of the new switch. `Level` 呼叫受保護的屬性，將值指派給新的參數。`Level` calls the protected property that assigns the value to the new switch. 此範例也會實作兩個評估屬性，以取得參數的指派的值。This example also implements two assessor properties to get the assigned value of the switch. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 下列範例會建立新的參數，在`Main`。The following example creates a new switch in `Main`. 它會建立新的參數，並將其指派的值。It creates a new switch and assigns it a value. 然後，根據參數設定中，它會輸出偵錯訊息進入和離開的方法。Then, depending on the switch settings, it outputs debugging messages for entering and leaving the method. [!code-cpp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic Switch Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic Switch Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

span.para: 如果您需要追蹤層級，或設定機制切換不同於所提供的層級，並，您可以繼承自。繼承自這個類別時，您必須實作方法。
If you need trace levels, or mechanisms for setting switch levels different from those provided by , and , you can inherit from . When inheriting from this class, you must implement the method.

The description for the switch.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立新物件、 值`displayName`參數用來尋找初始的交換器設定。When you create a new object, the value of the `displayName` parameter is used to find initial switch settings. 預設值為空字串 ("")。The default value is an empty string (""). 在 XML 組態檔中，您可以加入某個參數，和將其值設定、 移除參數，或清除所有先前設定中的參數，應用程式。Within the XML configuration file, you can add a switch and set its value, remove a switch, or clear all the switches previously set by the application. 執行應用程式時，不會偵測到動態變更組態檔。Dynamic changes to the configuration file are not detected while the application is executing. 您必須停止並重新啟動應用程式，組態檔的變更才會生效。You must stop and restart an application before changes to the configuration file take effect. 組態檔的格式應該類似下列的範例：The configuration file should be formatted like the following example: ```xml ```

span.para: 若要設定參數的值，設定建構函式中的屬性。
To set the value of the switch, set the property in the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: protected Switch (string displayName, string description, string defaultSwitchValue);

span.span: The name of the switch.
The description of the switch.
The default value for the switch.

summary.span: 指定的參數顯示名稱、描述和預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the display name, description, and default value for the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `displayName`參數用來設定的值屬性，而`description`參數用來設定的值屬性。The `displayName` parameter is used to set the value of the property, and the `description` parameter is use to set the value of the property. `defaultSwitchValue`參數是參數的值，如果由程式碼或組態檔屬性未設定屬性。The `defaultSwitchValue` parameter is the value for the switch if the property is not set by code or by the configuration file attribute. 請參閱多載，如需詳細資訊。See the overload for additional information.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Attributes As StringDictionary

summary.span: 取得在應用程式組態檔中定義的自訂參數屬性。

span.span: Gets the custom switch attributes defined in the application configuration file.

value.span: ，其中包含追蹤參數不分大小寫的自訂屬性。

span.span: A containing the case-insensitive custom attributes for the trace switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會識別應用程式的組態檔參考的自訂屬性。The property identifies the custom attributes referenced in the application's configuration file. 不會列舉未參考的自訂屬性。Unreferenced custom attributes are not enumerated. 繼承自類別類別可以加入自訂屬性，藉由覆寫方法，並傳回自訂屬性名稱的字串陣列。Classes that inherit from the class can add custom attributes by overriding the method and returning a string array of custom attribute names. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何顯示自訂參數無法辨識的屬性。The following code sample shows how to display the unrecognized attributes for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#15)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#15](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Description As String
public: property System::String ^ Description { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a description of the switch.
The description of the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該會指出參數; 的函式比方說，「 啟用的追蹤目錄監看員元件。 」This property should indicate the function of the switch; for example, "Enables tracing for a directory watcher component." 值由設定`descriptor`中的參數建構函式。The value is set by the `descriptor` parameter in the constructor.

public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets a name used to identify the switch.

value.span: 用來識別切換控制的名稱。

span.span: The name used to identify the switch.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您建立新物件，尋找初始的交換器設定。When you create a new object, the finds initial switch settings. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 建構函式與[如何： 建立、 初始化和設定追蹤參數](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md)Visual Studio 文件中。For more information, see the constructor and [How to: Create, Initialize and Configure Trace Switches](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/how-to-create-initialize-and-configure-trace-switches.md) in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示參數的顯示名稱，由追蹤來源的使用中。The following code example displays the display name for the switch in use by a trace source. 此程式碼範例是可在較大範例的一部分類別摘要。This code example is part of a larger example that can be found in the class summary. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#10)]

Protected Friend Overridable Function GetSupportedAttributes () As String()
abstract member GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[] override this.GetSupportedAttributes : unit -> string[]

summary.span: 取得由參數支援的自訂屬性。

span.span: Gets the custom attributes supported by the switch.

returns.span: 字串陣列，其中包含參數所支援的自訂屬性名稱；如果不支援自訂屬性，則為 。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the custom attributes supported by the switch, or if there no custom attributes are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作方法會傳回`null`。The default implementation for the method returns `null`. 如果參數會加入組態檔中，而且不包含在所傳回的字串陣列指定自訂屬性、載入參數時，會擲回。If a switch is added in a configuration file and custom attributes are specified that are not included in the string array returned by , a is thrown when the switch is loaded. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範的覆寫自訂參數的方法。The following code sample shows an override of the method for a custom switch. [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/CS/program.cs#34)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceSource#34](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Diagnostics.TraceSource/VB/program.vb#34)]

span.para: 當繼承自類別或衍生的類別中，您可以覆寫方法，以提供自訂屬性，為您的類別。
When inheriting from the class or a derived class, you can override the method to provide custom attributes for your class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSwitchSettingChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnSwitchSettingChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在 屬性變更時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 叫用第一次讀取參數值從組態檔，並變更參數的值是每次叫用。 is invoked the first time a switch reads the value from the configuration file and is invoked again each time the switch's value is changed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnValueChanged() cil managed
abstract member OnValueChanged : unit -> unit override this.OnValueChanged : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在 屬性變更時叫用。

span.span: Invoked when the property is changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作會剖析的新值屬性設為整數值，用來設定屬性。The default implementation parses the new value of the property to an integer value which it uses to set the property.

span.para: 您應該覆寫這個方法，並使用設定適當的轉換針對您的交換器的值。
You should override this method and use a conversion that sets the appropriate value for your switch.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property int SwitchSetting { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.SwitchSetting : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定這個切換控制的目前設定。

span.span: Gets or sets the current setting for this switch.

value.span: 這個切換控制的目前設定。

span.span: The current setting for this switch.
The default is zero.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Value : string with get, set

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the switch.
A string representing the value of the switch.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 時呼叫方法的值屬性變更。The method is called when the value of the property is changed. 方法會剖析這個屬性的值，並將它轉換成整數值，然後用來設定屬性。The method parses the value of this property and converts it to an integer value, which is then used to set the property.

span.span: The value is .
-or-

exception.span: 該值並不是只由選擇性 (Optional) 負號跟隨一連串範圍從 0 到 9 的數字所組成。

span.span: The value does not consist solely of an optional negative sign followed by a sequence of digits ranging from 0 to 9.
-or-

exception.span: 該值表示小於 或大於 的數字。

span.span: The value represents a number less than or greater than .

span.para: 您應該覆寫方法，並提供設定適當的轉換作業針對您的交換器的值。
You should override the method and provide a conversion operation that sets the appropriate value for your switch.
